source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a storm moving over the Grand Canyon. Heavy, dark clouds churn and roll rapidly across the sky. Sheets of rain can be seen falling in the distance, sweeping across the vast canyon landscape.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a storm moving over the Grand Canyon. Heavy, dark clouds churn and roll rapidly across the sky. Sheets of rain can be seen falling in the distance, sweeping across the vast canyon landscape.

generated_critique: The caption should also mention that lightning bolts repeatedly strike the canyon rim during the storm.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a storm moving over the Grand Canyon. Heavy, dark clouds churn and roll rapidly across the sky. Sheets of rain can be seen falling in the distance, sweeping across the vast canyon landscape, while lightning bolts repeatedly strike the canyon rim during the storm.
